name: H&M Monochrome Shift Dress
description:
A black and white/cream shift style dress in a soft slightly satin look material with a keyhole at the back of the neck with a button. Bought from H&M over a year ago to be worn at a wedding reception but never wore it again. In good condition - no snags, tears, pulls, stains, etc. It is a UK Size 10. If you have any questions or would like more pictures, email me at thelittleblacksandals@live.co.uk
WILL ONLY SHIP TO UK

name: Forever21 Pleat Chiffon & Lace Skirt
description:
Firstly, I apologise as in the image you cannot see as much of the lace detail and the tiny pleats which are in the material - if I can I will soon change the image or you can email me for more at thelittleblacksandals@live.co.uk. I bought the skirt from Forever21 on a trip to New York in January and wore it on my trip once with tights. However, on my return home I sadly never wore it again as although I loved it, it was just a tad short for my liking! Therefore it is in immaculate condition. It was a US size small and it fit me perfectly - I am typically a UK size 8/10 and the material and waistband does have a lot of stretch! If you have any questions, want more images or wish to negotiate on price, email me.
WILL ONLY SHIP TO UK

name: Mango Black Chiffon Maxi Skirt
description:
I bought this skirt from Mango just under a year ago. It is in perfect condition with no snags, tears or stains. I bought it online and when it came it was a size too big! I wore it once or twice but had to safety pin the waist before accepting it just didn't fit and I would sadly have to get rid of it! The website stated it was a Medium/Size 10 although I think it is much closer to a 12 if you want it to sit on the waist. It is entirely black with a wide waistband, a short underskirt and a long chiffon skirt with two side splits. I bought it originally for about £40.00 and considering the condition I think £19.00 is an incredibly reasonable price although if you wish to negotiate email me at: thelittleblacksandals@live.co.uk
WILL ONLY SHIP TO UK
